20110106143359.000|20110106143402.000|CC1|WHO TESTIFIED THAT MICHAEL      
20110106143402.000|20110106143405.000|CC1|JACKSON LOOKED LIFELESS, DEAD,  
20110106143405.000|20110106143405.000|CC1|WHEN ARRIVED.                   
20110106143405.000|20110106143406.000|CC1|HIS EYES WERE DRIED OUT, HIS    
20110106143406.000|20110106143409.000|CC1|HAND AND FEET LOOKED BLUE.      
20110106143409.000|20110106143411.000|CC1|THE PARAMEDIC ASKED DR. MURRAY  
20110106143411.000|20110106143413.000|CC1|IF HE HAD GIVEN JACKSON ANY     
20110106143413.000|20110106143413.000|CC1|MEDICATION.

20110106143414.000|20110106143416.000|CC1|JUST SLEEP MEDICATION AND THAT  
20110106143416.000|20110106143417.000|CC1|MICHAEL JACKSON WAS  TREATED    
20110106143417.000|20110106143420.000|CC1|FOR DEE DE HYDRATION AND DR.

20110106143424.000|20110106143425.000|CC1|KILLED THE POP STAR.            
20110106143425.000|20110106143428.000|CC1|NOW, EARLIER IN THE DAY,        
20110106143428.000|20110106143429.000|CC1|ANOTHER BODYGUARD, ALBERTO      
20110106143429.000|20110106143430.000|CC1|ALVAREZ, TOOK THE STAND AND     
20110106143430.000|20110106143433.000|CC1|SAID  DR. MURRAY INSTRUCTED HIM 
20110106143433.000|20110106143434.000|CC1|TO PUT AWAY MEDICAL BOTTLES AND 
20110106143434.000|20110106143435.000|CC1|VIAL.

20110106143436.000|20110106143439.000|CC1|A BAG OUT OF SIGHT BEFORE 911   
20110106143439.000|20110106143440.000|CC1|WAS CALLED.

20110106143441.000|20110106143443.000|CC1|PART OF A  COVER-UP.

20110106143444.000|20110106143446.000|CC1|EMOTIONAL AS HE RECOUNTED
